you who you are, you know?”

Caleb smiled, feeling the bond between them rekindling. “Yeah, I think I’m ready to find my way back too, starting with the things that matter.” As the conversation flowed, Caleb realized this moment was not just a chance encounter; it was an essential step toward rebuilding his life, intertwining it with his past but forging a new path forward.
